attributes.action: Introduce voluntary COVID-19 policing scheme to the public
attributes.additional_details: The police shortages will make enforcing the "stay at home" measures difficult, so this petition is to suggest that the government introduces a scheme where members of the public in the lowest risk categories can register to receive powers to serve fines to those disrespecting the rules.
attributes.background: The police shortages will make enforcing the "stay at home" measures difficult, so this petition is to suggest that the government introduces a scheme where members of the public in the lowest risk categories can register to receive the powers to serve fines to those disrespecting the rules.

rejection.details:
You can already apply to volunteer as a PCSO or Special Constable. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/police-community-support-officers-what-they-are

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
